articles.description: The Cannes Film Festival kicked off last week, returning to the French Riviera for the first time since Bong Joon Ho’s “Parasite” nabbed the Palme d’Or.
articles.content: The Cannes Film Festival kicked off last week, returning to the French Riviera for in-person festivities for the first time since Bong Joon Hos Parasite nabbed the top prize and conquered world cinem… [+3752 chars]
